summary: Two friends who are doing civil service flee to the Austrian Alps to escape being forced into the army. While there, one of them rediscovers his past and they realise that it's going to be more fun than they thought.
cast: Rick Kavanian|Axel Stein|Eva Habermann|Christoph M. title: Feuer, Eis & Dosenbier
